Please, folks.  If you are supportive of this effort, contribution and
constructive criticism is welcome in this thread.  If you are
dismissive of the effort and wish to offer any sort of criticism,
please post that to the "REST isn't hard to learn, it's just taught
wrong" thread, where it is on-topic.

Thanks,
Eric
